SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

fr.exanpe.t5.lib.annotation
Annotation Type ContextPageReset

@Target(value=METHOD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Documented
public @interface ContextPageReset

Annotation to mark a method as reseting the page depending on a marker sent in the context. If ExanpeSymbols.CONTEXT_PAGE_RESET_MARKER is found in the request, every method containing this annotation, or named "void contextReset()", will be triggered.
For Tapestry 5.3, a package protected method "void onActivate()" have to be defined in the class.

Since:
1.2
Author:
jmaupoux
See Also:
ExanpeSymbols.CONTEXT_PAGE_RESET_MARKER
